resources.string: Lit Momentos is your newest travel companion. Capture and share your travel experiences with family and friends!!!
Create and edit your travel experiences easily with our simplified user interface.
Share your precious travel moments with your loved ones and friends with a single click.
Get Informative Insights and track your Lit moments with our easy-to-use dashboard.
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Access to all Lit board features
Designed and developed by Allan Gisoni

Integrity and transparency is at the center of everything we do. Your privacy is important to us and we want to make it easy for you to comprehend your data settings. Do not hesitate to reach out to us at allangisoni@gmail.com if you have any question.

We automatically collect user personal info such as email or any other identity for login purpose and identify user uniquely on Lit Moments app. All data generated by users within the app is stored safely and securely at our data servers and is NOT shared with any other users.
If you have agreed to data collection, this application collects some usage data that are critical for us to deliver our services, to understand your needs and to improve our services.

Lit Moments reserves the right to make changes to this privacy policy at any time by giving notice to its users on this page. It is strongly recommended to check this page often. If a User objects to any of the changes to the Policy, the User must cease using this Application and can request that Lit Moments remove the Personal Data. Unless stated otherwise, the then-current privacy policy applies to all Personal Data the Data Controller has about users.
If you have any questions regarding privacy while using the app, or have questions about our practices, please feel free to contact us via email at Allangisoni@gmail.com.

You are advised to please read these terms of use carefully before using Lit Moments application for mobile phones. These terms apply to all users and others who use the application. By installing and using the application, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree or do not accept the terms then you may not install or use the application. Your use of the Lit Moments application is subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this End-User License Agreement (EULA);
1. Liability: In no event will the owner be liable for anything that may arise from the use of this application.

2. Restriction of use: You agree that you shall not in any circumstance make or distribute copies of this application or transfer this application from one device to another. Moreover, you shall not decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble, include in other application, or translate the application,or use the application for any commercial purposes unless with authorization from the owner.

3. Licence: This application is being licensed to you and you hereby acknowledge that no title or ownership in the application being transferred or assigned and this EULA is not to be construed as a sale of any rights in the application.

4. Warranty: This application is provided "AS IS", without warranty of any kind. We disclaim and make no express or implied warranties and specifically disclaim the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement of third-party rights.

5. Redirects to other sites: This application may contain links to other third-party sites or services that we do not own or control. We assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that we shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such sites or services.

6. Termination: At any given time we may decide to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the EULA

7. Changes: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these terms at any time with or without notice. Please keep checking this page from time to time and take note of any changes.
If you have any questions regarding this EULA, or have questions about our practices, please feel free to contact us via email at allangisoni@gmail.com.
